content.rendered:
Practicing Rules and Methods

(Instruction, Practice, Experience, Attainment)
All Important Spiritual Instruction by Pujya Guruji

Philosophy of Yoga ♦ Meditation ♦ Mantra (Japa) Meditation ♦ Path of Bhakti Yoga ♦ Sadhana (Spiritual Practice) ♦ GEOKC Bhakti Yoga Meditation ♦ Slide Shows and Presentations

Philosophy of Yoga

(Traditional physical and mental disciplines of Indian Origin)
A Hindu discipline aimed at training the consciousness
for a state of perfect spiritual insight and tranquility

How to bring Meditation into your Yoga Practice

Meditation

All About Meditation:

Meditation Techniques

Path of Bhakti Yoga

Practice of the Yoga of Devotion

Coming soon….

Sadhana

Spiritual exertion towards an intended goal

Retreat Events

GEOKC Bhakti Yoga Meditation

(Learn how to meditate in the Bhakti Yoga tradition, and attain perfect divine bliss)
Knowledge, guidelines and tips for starting or deepening
devotees’ practice of bhakti yoga meditation

Instructions on Bhakthi Yoga Meditation:

  • Instruction on Individual Bhakti Yoga Meditation
  • Instruction on Group Bhakti Yoga Meditation

Slide Shows and Presentations

Coming soon…
